casebody.data:
DOES 1-17, individuals, Petitioners,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Douglas Smith, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Adam P. Laxalt, Attorney General of the State of Nevada; James Wright, Director of the Nevada Department of Public Safety; Natalie Wood, Chief of the Parole and Probation Division of the Nevada Department of Public Safety; and Julie Butler, Division Administrator of the Records and Technology Division of the Nevada Department of Public Safety, Real Parties in Interest. No. 70704 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED APRIL 27, 2018

DENIED.
